name: Dedant
storyline: Help the ant protect the ant hill from intruder and protect the queen. Push pebbles to close the hole against intruders, but it's not easy.
summary:
Dedant is the fourty sixth game of the NES version of Action 52.

You're a pink ant who has to kill other ants. But in the later levels, if a spider gets down where you are, you're pretty much screwed. The game has six levels. With each level, more types of enemies appear.
